headline: No hassle migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One with The Descaler Program
keywords: Security Week, Descaler, Cloudflare One, Zero Trust
description: Cloudflare is excited to launch the Descaler Program, a frictionless path to migrate existing Zscaler customers to Cloudflare One. Cloudflare is making it even easier for enterprise customers to make the switch to a faster, simpler, and more agile foundation for security and network transformation
